name: Magic Coupon And Deal
author: ifourtechnolab

sections.description:
A WordPress plugin that magically convert your wordpress blog to coupon website and display Coupon Code and available deals in front end.

For Support Contact Us
sections.installation:
1. Upload magic-coupon-and-deal.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add single-coupon.php in your templates if you want to change layouts.
sections.faq:
1. It is free ?
    Yes.- Magic Coupon And Deal for WP is totaly free and there is no extra charges for used this plugin
  2. It is Configurable ?
    Yes.- Magic Coupon And Deal for WP is configurable from admin.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload magic-coupon-and-deal.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add single-coupon.php in your templates if you want to change layouts.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Magic Coupon And Deal for WP is ready for production.
